The Suzuki Ciaz is a spacious sedan that offers comfort and safety.
Perfect for school runs, your daily commute to work, and even roadtrips! It has enough space to comfortably seat 4 adults and has enough room for their luggage.
We do a 101 quality check on every vehicle and we do Roadworthy upon delivery.

**SERVICE PLAN OF 5 YEARS OR 90 000KMS**
**WARRANTY OF 5 YEARS OR 200 000KMS**
**AA ROADSIDE ASSIST – 3 YEARS**

The Honda CR-V feels instantly familiar when you get behind the wheel, and it’s packed with features designed to make your life easier. Versatility, competency, and reliability are the tenets on which the CR-V is known for and it’s no stranger to luxury. The fluid lines of the CR-V were designed not only to create a sleek and dynamic look, but also to assist performance by channelling airflow, resulting in improved fuel economy.

For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248729. **FACE LIFT MODEL**

**LEATHER INTERIOR**
**ELECTRIC HEATED FRONT SEATS**
**DRIVER SEAT MEMORY**
**7” RADIO**
**APPLE CAR PLAY AND ANDROID AUTO**
**FRONT AND REAR PARK DISTANCE SENSORS**

**5 YEARS/90 000KMS SERVICE PLAN**
**5 YEARS/ 200 000KMS WARRANTY**
**AA ROADSIDE ASSIST – 3 YEARS**

The stylish fifth-generation Honda CR-V shares your spirit of adventure, and gives you the freedom and flexibility to explore the
world around you.The fluid lines of the CR-V were designed not only
to create a sleek and dynamic look, but also to assist performance by channelling airflow, resulting in improved fuel economy. The chrome garnish and rear skid plate provide the CR-V with an individual and purposeful look, while the door mirrors’ curved edges harmonise with theoverall design, reducing blind spots around the car. The dramatic window design provides superb all-round visibility and makes it a pleasure to be seen in.

attributes.description:
Don't wait, call now to book your test drive...
All our vehicles undergo a Dekra Condition Report and an EXTRA quality check at our workshop for that peace of mind motoring. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. Come and join our Nissan Parow Family where trust and service are our main focus. We will tailor make a package that will suit your needs. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced and professional Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you here on our safe and spacious showroom. Contact the Motus Nissan Parow TEAM NOW!

attributes.description:
Finance can be arranged, Excludes administration, delivery and license registration fees, 80 point quality check, Very neat, Trade-ins accepted, Test drives welcome, Nationwide delivery.

Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our Bistro. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Motus Toyota Bryanston.
